typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		userID as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string,
		smoker as string,
		drink_level as string,
		dress_preference as string,
		ambience as string,
		transport as string,
		marital_status as string,
		hijos as string,
		birth_year as string,
		interest as string,
		personality as string,
		religion as string,
		activity as string,
		color as string,
		weight as string,
		budget as string,
		height as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(smoker, "false")) ~> smokerfilter
smokerfilter sort(asc(latitude, true)) ~> sortbylatitude
sortbylatitude sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
